title: Delhi's peak power demand clocks 6987 MW, highest-ever in the first 18 days of May
description: Delhi's peak power demand reached a record high of 6987 MW on May 17, surpassing previous levels in May. The State Load Despatch Center data and an official release highlighted the increase in demand. Weather variations, green power initiatives, and potential future demand are critical for stable summer power supply.
